title:
I am a curler and am working with Ice House in Ogden to start a curling league in Wilmington.  May I publicize our public Learn to Curl with a short submitted article or will it require a paid ad.



Curling is getting more popular as it is a popular winter olympic sport.  We think that it might be a nice option to go inside and curl on ice in July.



You can call me  910-548-4879
text: I'm forwarding your request to Sports Editor Dan Spears.
